description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
experimental phases consisting of training and transfer phases- 1 / 2
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set – training_1/ training_2/ transfer_1/ transfer_2
year the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study - chimpanzee/capuchin
whether the data is raw_data  or summary data – raw_data / summary
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
indicates session in the summary data
species subgroup at time of data collection – WKPRC chimpanzee group a or b/ etc
apparatus used in the experiment - transparent / opaque
the number of trials the participant correctly chose a long tool
color of the the handle the participant chose - yellow / white / blue
length of the sticks – short / medium / long
total number of of correct tool choices
mean number of correct tool choices across trials
